India:
Narayanrao Peshwa is murdered by his uncle Raghunathrao's wife in front of Raghunathrao.
Regulating Act of 1773
Warren Hastings appointed as first Governor-General of Bengal
Philippine: Clement XIV suppresses the Society of Jesus in his papal brief Dominus ac Redemptor
Poland: Creation of Commission of National Education
Russia: Pugachev's Rebellion: The army of the Cossack Yemelyan Pugachev attacked and occupied Samara. A confederated sejm was forced to ratify the first partition of Poland.

Discovery of oxygen by Carl Wilhelm Scheele
Royal Swedish Opera founded
Tonga: Captain James Cook first visited Tonga and referred to it as the "Friendly Islands".
